overview: This film promotes the goal to the category of science. And the title, "Zico na Rede", says exactly what it proposes: a party of goals, all preceded by short and objective speeches by Zico himself, by colleagues like Junior, Adílio, Raul, Edinho or the folkloric Peu, explaining the genesis of each goal and its degrees of difficulty or originality.
tagline: The career of the biggest goalmaker of Maracanã told through goals
title: Zico Na Rede
